amendment.description: Amendment deleted a provision from the resolution that had left certain language in the bill subject to a point of order.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "; page 17, lines 21 through 24" on page 2 of the bill.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution. Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 185 (Roll no. 174).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
